Manual

The sleuth package consists of the commands listed below. Click to see the help or type help(package="sleuth") in R.

basic_filter

$<-.sleuth

design_matrix

excluded_ids

extract_model

get_bootstraps

get_bootstrap_summary

get_col

is_kallisto_subset

kallisto_table

log_transform

models

norm_factors

plot_bootstrap

plot_fld.kallisto

plot_fld.sleuth

plot_group_density

plot_loadings

plot_ma

plot_mean_var

plot_pca

plot_pc_variance

plot_qq

plot_sample_density

plot_sample_heatmap

plot_scatter

plot_transcript_heatmap

plot_vars

plot_volcano

print.sleuth_model

read_kallisto_h5

read_kallisto

read_kallisto_tsv

sleuth_deploy

sleuth_fit

sleuth_gene_table

sleuth_live

sleuth_live_settings

sleuth_load

sleuth_lrt

sleuth_prep

sleuth_results

sleuth_save

sleuth_to_matrix

sleuth_wt

subset_kallisto
